ModMetaData.name: Third Reich Apparel
ModMetaData.author: EmilRins
ModMetaData.description:
Adds Third Reich themed Apparel to the game, fit for an Emperor of your Colony great for your Ideology or Royalty playthrough
(NEW) They now are able to be spawned as Relics, I've also adjusted a few stats
current Apparel include:
~ Führers Hat (Adolf H. Hat) ~ SS Hat (SS Unit Hat) ~ Armbinde (Armband)
